title: Union for Reform Judaism nonprofit revoked in 2024 in Illinois

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

hereby request the following records:
unofficial copies of any documents regarding the revocation of UNION FOR REFORM JUDAISM's nonprofit in Illinois
REVOKED on 08-09-2024

Entity Name UNION FOR REFORM JUDAISM
File Number 69978126
Status REVOKED on 08-09-2024
Entity Type CORPORATION Type of Corp NOT-FOR-PROFIT
Qualification Date (Foreign) 03-06-2015 State OHIO
Duration Date PERPETUAL
Annual Report Filing Date
00-00-0000
Annual Report
Year
2024
Agent Information 
C T CORPORATION SYSTEM
208 SO LASALLE ST, SUITE 814
CHICAGO ,IL 60604-1101

regarding 8/09/2024 revocation and documents requesting and granting reinstatement.  Any tax documents filed by them for the years 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023 or 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. There is a public interest in the misclassification of this entity as a church, when in fact that is not accurate.

I request that I be properly classified as a news media requester. I am a writer for the Times of Israel and I am requesting this information in that editorial capacity.
https://blogs.timesofisrael.com/author/julie-guilfoyle/

The Times of Israel is widely recognized for its reporting, publishing regular features on issues of public interest and importance.

In addition, I have covered areas related to this request, and plan to use my editorial skills to analyze and produce original reporting work for my audience.

If you have any questions about my media status, please contact me.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julie Guilfoyle

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julie Guilfoyle

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julie Guilfoyle

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Julie Guilfoyle
